Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;steel warblade^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 优秀，希望你能享受切割物品的快感。这是我给你的。
Texts.Eng: Excellent, enjoy cutting stuff up. Here, take this off my hands.
I'll be blunt. My sword sucks. Make me a new one. Go craft a ^orange;Steel Warblade^reset; in your ^orange;Assembly Line^reset;! You'll need to upgrade your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; first.
